entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who suspects that the parchment contains Dark Magic. He is described as having a rigid jaw with anger.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a teacher at Hogwarts who is trying to defend Harry and explain the parchment. He warns Harry not to interrupt.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the student who received the parchment. He doesn't understand what Snape is talking about.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is a person mentioned by Lupin as one of the manufacturers of Dark Magic items.

entities.name: parchment
entities.description: The parchment is described as being full of Dark Magic and insulting to read.

relationships.description: Snape and Lupin disagree about the nature of the parchment.
Snape suspects that Harry got the parchment from a manufacturer, possibly Wormtail.
Lupin mentions Wormtail as one of the manufacturers of Dark Magic items.
Snape accuses Harry of getting the parchment from a manufacturer, possibly Wormtail.
